message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. It's a valuable asset that I believe will be worth even more to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $1200000 is a good starting point, I'm still hoping for a price closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to come down to $1300000.  Let's see if we can reach a mutually agreeable price.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $1200000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1250000. Let's see if we can make a deal.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1250000 is still a bit below what I'm hoping for.  I'm willing to come down to $1280000.  This would be a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll find this product incredibly valuable.  Let's close this deal.

I'm really interested in the product, but I'm starting to think I can get it cheaper elsewhere. I'll meet you at $1200000, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to sell it to me for that price, I'll have to look elsewhere.
